website_summaries.verdict: This attractive squirrel feeder is sure to bring a smile to your face time and time again.
pros: Picnic table-inspired feeder boasts a look and feel all its own
Large in comparison to similar feeders
Constructed from cedar that is decay-resistant
Simple to attach the feeder to a wood surface with only two screws
cons: Picnic table's benches may become loose and fall off over time

customer_reviews.title: No More Destrcutive Squirrels
customer_reviews.text: For the last couple of years we've had issues with destructive squirrels in our yard. They chewed through a beam in our pergola, destroyed our veggie garden and even ate the eggs right of a bird's nest. We sprayed a repellent and that worked temporarily, but you need to re-apply every month. I ordered the Picnic Table Feeder, not to use as a feeder but rather as a deterrent. We put it on a tree on the opposite side of the yard with some feed corn and it worked! I haven't seen a squirrel in our pergola or pool area in weeks, but we can still enjoy watching them eat and play from a distance.
customer_reviews.author: M.S.

customer_reviews.title: So adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I've recently bought 3 different squirrel feeders and this one is my favorite. Wood quality could have been sanded a little more. Edges are kind of rough. But it's a solid functional piece. I buy giant bags of dehydrated corn here off Amazon and the squirrels and chipmunks go crazy for them! Took a few days for them to take their first nibble, and now weeks later, they haven't left. They'll go through a corn cob in less than an hour. Perfect entertainment for me and my young kids!
customer_reviews.author: Miranda

customer_reviews.title: Squirrels love it!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put up it comes with two screws I drill a couple of shallow holes in the bark and just screwed it in. Put it up just this morning and the squirrels are going crazy for it and it’s not even noon. The table is sturdy enough for the squirrels to sit at and eat. If you love watching nature you’ll get a kick out of this. They really love that corn too! This is the corn I used: Songbird Essentials Ear Corn, Bag...  Enjoy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Riven

customer_reviews.title: Great feeder!
customer_reviews.text: This thing hung on the tree for several weeks before the squirrels decided to try it out. Now they love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Roughton

customer_reviews.title: Great fun to watch the creatures eat!
customer_reviews.text: This is a delightful addition to our backyard. It only took about one day for our urban squirrels to locate it and a couple hours to realize you must sit on the bench, not perch atop the corn! Kids love it, shipped quickly, nicely made...so popular we may open up another location on a second tree! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: M.R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says. I've found my squirrels tend to eat the bran end of the kernel, and chuck the rest, when there is a frtesh ear on the feeder. When they've stripped that one, then they'll start foraging through the bits of kernel some more. It doesn't take them long to finish one off, but it's fun to watch them at it.
customer_reviews.author: resonance

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, high quality & fair price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my home bound mother. It arrived on time. The quality of the feeder is very high. Within an hour of putting corn on it the squirrels were coming up to eat. Since then we have to put corn out every day. My mother loves this. Great idea, high quality & fair price. Will look to do more business.
customer_reviews.author: Mike P.

customer_reviews.title: A fun way to feed the squirrels
customer_reviews.text: This is the most well made squirrel feeder I've ever seen and I have been through a bunch of them. The construction is very solid. It is made out of Cedar so wood eating bugs will leave it alone. The squirrels sitting there on the bench eating is just plain cute. Kind of funny to watch as well. Makes the backyard entertainment even more fun. I wish I had a camera that could get close enough to show it without scaring the furry moochers off. This product gets my highest recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Really flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I was/am pretty disappointed by this feeder. The material is soft wood and it’s put together with staples, glue and screws. The back was bent when I got it, but was easy to fix. It screws into a tree easily. The screw to hold a corn cob is probably about right, but I’m using a squirrel log, which has a pre-drilled hole a bit larger than the screw. I just put a toothpick in the hole and it works OK. I can’t see this thing lasting too long. The squirrels don’t seem to like it either. Just kidding, but I’ve had no traffic on it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Norman LeFevre

customer_reviews.title: Rip off!  No stars, but it won't let me .
customer_reviews.text: This is the most disappointing item I have ever purchased, it is miniture in size and doesn't look like picture at all , I don't want to return it because I have been staying in as I am high risk. I would hope some one reviews this and removes this product. If you want to credit back half on my accythat would be acceptable since it is half the size advertised very deceptive
customer_reviews.author: Danna R. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Dining in style is not just for people
customer_reviews.text: The first time I saw the picnic table squirrel feeder I knew I had to have it. I feed my squirrels twice a day. I just leave the food in the crooks of trees or on the fencepost. It is the highlight of my evening to sit and watch them feast. My babies deserve the best so they might as well dine in style. This is just the cutest thing ever.
customer_reviews.author: Erma P. Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Too small for squirrels
customer_reviews.text: Too small for a California squirrel. The squirrels take the food but do not sit on the bench. They just reach down to eat. Table is so small the squirrels would fall off this toy. It’s even smaller then a barbie table.
customer_reviews.author: California408

customer_reviews.title: No he doesn't get near the squirrels.
customer_reviews.text: Had to find new toys for the dogs with everything, then it dawned on me this was a perfect gift for my dad's little squirrel patrol Captain (Scooter). He loves watching them, I mean protecting my dad from them😊
customer_reviews.author: valerie h.

customer_reviews.title: Great little picnic area for my lil buddies
customer_reviews.text: It took a whole day for the squirrels 🐿 to finally come up to it and start eating the corn 🌽 and walnuts I put out there. But now a couple have been sitting there having a all you can eat meal while the others still continue to eat off the bird 🦅 feeder. It is fun to watch these guys lol We have a squirrel 🐿 we’ve named Fat Marlon and he seems to like to lay on the bird feeder and spread out and just eat, lil Chad baby squirrel will go to the picnic table when Marlon scares him away from the bird feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Boostfed

customer_reviews.title: Cute table
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install! Didn't attach to tree though, but did attach it to a wooden pole that is used to hold up other feeders. Seems study. Since I had purchased it, the price increased about $5. Saw something similar on FB and that might have made it become more desirable? I didn't treat the wood for being outside, so hopefully it will hold up. I haven't seen it used yet by squirrels, but did see birds sitting in it waiting their turn at the other bird feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Birds & Squirrels eating in Harmony
customer_reviews.text: A friend bought one of these and put it on a tree - a little larger one that doesn't have the corn holder. My husband stained it a great red and put it on a post on our deck. It's taken a couple of days, but they've finally found it and are chowing down. It hasn't stopped them from eating the bird food droppings from the ground, but they aren't actively on the bird feeder - at this point anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi C.

customer_reviews.title: As I expected, entertainment
customer_reviews.text: Not too far out my home office window I screwed this to my tree out front and it's provided the occasional distraction from my home office screen (era of cv19 as of this writing). I've noticed kids that walk by get a kick out of it too. The squirrels seem to be terribly inefficient however b/c most of the corn kernels appear to wind up on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Conway Jr.

customer_reviews.title: This is hysterical!
customer_reviews.text: We have our squirrel picnic table facing a big picture window in our house. Our kids love to look our the window and watch the squirrels eat at the picnic table. They get so excited that they shout “We’ve got a customer!” at the top of their lungs. It’s pretty amusing. It was very easy to intall as well.
customer_reviews.author: JandL

customer_reviews.title: Small, rough edges, bit over priced but stinking adorable!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is quite a bit smaller than I realized; I think the benches should be bigger. Also, the wood is not sanded at all and I think for $26 they could have stained it. If it wasn’t the fact that it is so stinking cute and I cannot wait to see the squirrels sit at it, I would give it a lower rating. From what I see online, though, this price seems comparable to other ones I’ve seen.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Graham

customer_reviews.title: One of my best investments ever!
customer_reviews.text: It took a few months for my squirrels to find and feel comfortable with their little table. But now that they have, they can’t get enough! I installed it low to the ground just a few feet outside my kitchen window, where I can enjoy watching them all day. They are ridiculously cute. This is one of my best gifts to myself.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Cute picnic table style!
customer_reviews.text: This picnic table style is so cute! I was not expecting the squirrels to actually sit on it as if it were an actual table, but I was wrong! The squirrels love this, they go through at least one corn cob every day! I’ve also been able to put other foods on the little needle for them like watermelon and lettuce.
customer_reviews.author: Jon C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my backyard to feed my squirrels and it worked within a half hour of putting it up. The squirrels are all over it absolutely love it
customer_reviews.author: airforce

customer_reviews.title: Lunch in the tree.
customer_reviews.text: The squirrels love this thing. Well. Truth be told. They love corn. But. This picnic table makes watching them more amusing than your standard cedar plank feeder. Comes with two screws to attach. Well made. Squirrel approved. Four and not five stars because it would be amazingly better if it were about 20% larger in scale.
customer_reviews.author: oldOtter

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: I’m so glad I found this on Amazon!! I think it’s the cutest thing ever and my neighborhood squirrel buddies have been living the corn and seating. It was packaged nicely when it arrived. It was really easy to install and it is well built. Highly recommend buying this if you’re looking for a squirrel feeder.
customer_reviews.author: kla24

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to my apartment patio!
customer_reviews.text: Since we purchased a bird feeder, my daughter shared how we needed to offer the local squirrels some snacks as well! Since corn is a relatively low-cost expense, I figured this would be easy up-keep. The product comes assembled. We simply had to drill it into our post using the screws provided. It's perfect for our apartment patio and our neighborhood squirrels love it!
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson had so much fun with his picnic table squirrel feeder that I wanted one as well. Absolutely love watching the squirrels eating from it. Our neighbor liked it so much that he also gave one to his parents. So nice to have some positive things happen during the current pandemic!
customer_reviews.author: Vicki L Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Too expensive for the size of feeder. Not real wood, it was that cheap pressed wood. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: hello2u2

customer_reviews.title: Dimension way too small for squirrel
customer_reviews.text: This adorable well designed product is unfortunately way too small for a squirrel to sit. Our squirrels are clinging to a tree eating upside down. The dimension between the table top & seat are fit for a lego.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: This product not only arrived broken it was made with cheap thin wood and most of the nails were exposed. It made me think of a ten year old child’s Scouting project to earn a badge...very disappointing! Awarding only one star because zero wasn’t an option...
customer_reviews.author: Norma Szerlag

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I sent it back, which I rarely do. Some of the wood was split and it was very poorly made. If I kept it I would have had to fix it, sand it and varnish it. Not worth the bother since I could find a much better one on Etsy for a lower price. I expect better from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Van Norden

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FEEDER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This "Picnic Table Squirrel Feeder" is AMAZING!!!! It is easy to setup, place corn and keep clean. I looked at and researched many feeders before I decided to order this one. All I can say is I am so glad I decided to go with this one!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I have not placed this where I want it...YET. I need to do some fence work first. This looks very doable for my needs. As you can see I added a couple of cans to hold seeds as well. This is gonna be SO MUCH FUN!
customer_reviews.author: Vaygar-Ingvald Elmersson aka Caroll EH Reimer

customer_reviews.title: Freaking hilarious
customer_reviews.text: Anything that makes me smile right now is worth it's weight in gold, right?!? Now I have to figure out a quicker way to dry corn cobs than 8 hours in the over...........or go buy some unsalted peanuts :) Love it!
customer_reviews.author: L. Beth Stock

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited when this arrived. We hung it right away and within just a couple of days, it was getting wobbly. So, since it was cute and the squirrels seem to adapt to their new dinner/snack mode, we decided to put a brace on it and keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim  W.

customer_reviews.title: Cute Table to feed the Squirrels
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didnt give it 5 stars, I wish I could remove the center screw. The squirrels are doing well nativaging around it though. I pile the walnuts pretty high. I started with 3 squirrels before I installed this and now I have 4 just one day later. Thinking about installing a habitat for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Tiny, But Cute!
customer_reviews.text: I put this tiny, cute table on a table with corn for the squirrels. After four days, they've knocked it off the table, but they haven't tried the corn yet. I knocked off a star because the edges are very rough wood.
customer_reviews.author: P&S Woods

customer_reviews.title: A gem...it's hard not to watch the squirrels all day!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! It came rapidly, it's sturdy, and it's easy to put up. I had a question for the merchant, and it was answered right away. And best of all, it's fun to watch the squirrels enjoy their lunch! I recommend this merchant and product.
customer_reviews.author: Adam S. Glantz

customer_reviews.title: Super cute squirrel feeder!
customer_reviews.text: We installed this squirrel feeder on our back fence. It took about 3 days to start getting visitors. Hoping to catch one in the act and get a cute picture of the squirrel sitting at the table. :-)
customer_reviews.author: cruzinstephie

customer_reviews.title: Great for birds
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute little picnic table that the squirrels in my back yard hate. Works well as a squirrel repellent, actually. But the birds love it and perch on the seat so I'm giving it a good rating. Certainly not the seller's fault our neighborhood squirrels are adverse to it
customer_reviews.author: Eineam

customer_reviews.title: Charlie sure is a happy little squirrel!
customer_reviews.text: So cute, Charlie sure will put this to good use
customer_reviews.author: melissa herron

customer_reviews.title: Small with Nail Sticking up in the middle
customer_reviews.text: This is really too small to adequately feed squirrels or birds. The nail is possibly to put an ear of corn on, but not strong enough for that, which is still not adequate for that purpose, or to put bird food on. In other words, I can't use it for anything.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it-the squirrels seem to enjoy it. The only suggestion I have is that the screw be longer because the squirrels can get the ear of corn off. I replaced the screw with a longer one.
customer_reviews.author: MeM

customer_reviews.title: Merry Christmas Squirrels!
customer_reviews.text: This feeder was placed in my back yard in line with my windows. Now I can watch the squirrels eating as well as playing. Construction was very good. I expect this will last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle J. Moore

customer_reviews.title: Entertaining to watch!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted a way to keep squirrels from eating the bird seed from the bird feeders, so we got this because 1) it's FREAKING ADORABLE and 2) it gives the squirrels their own place to eat - works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Dr Smoov

customer_reviews.title: Cannot use with “no waste” corn
customer_reviews.text: Cute and delivered very promptly. We prefer to use the no-waste corn to keep the mess down. Unfortunately, the screw where you put the corn is way too small and the corn is easily flipped off by the squirrels. Looks like a fix-it project for my hubby.
customer_reviews.author: OregonLass

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute and well made. My forest squirrels aren’t remotely interested in it or the corn. Lol...I’ve watched them investigate and move on...snobby squirrels. Regardless, it’s a cute gift.
customer_reviews.author: MomNana

customer_reviews.title: Awesome squirrel watching!
customer_reviews.text: Omg i love this thing!! Super quick delivery and very well made. I hung it up last night and woke up to happy squirrels. Totally recommend. I could watch them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Tifany carter

customer_reviews.title: Great Squirrel Picnic Table!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea for your bird feeder/squirrel feeder areas of your yard. My family enjoys watching the squirrels eating off this table. Great quality and even better price!
customer_reviews.author: Larry E. Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Held together with staples
customer_reviews.text: Held together using staples. I'm afraid the table will fall off the mounting board with the weight of a squirrel. It's wobbly now but will take it down tomorrow & put a couple of screws in.
customer_reviews.author: North Idaho Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squirrels Picnic is Fun to Watch
customer_reviews.text: We love watching the picnic of the squirrels. They go thru about one in a day - greedy little buggers. But they enjoy it, as do some of the birds. It's fun to watch them.
customer_reviews.author: Nerd Mom

customer_reviews.title: Really cute.
customer_reviews.text: Well made and really cute. The squirrels love it. The screw that holds the corn cob could be bigger or longer because the squirrels can take away the whole cob.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love your squirrels!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The squirrels in my yard love it. I give them food, enjoy seen them eating in their own bench and they leave alone my plants and flowers. Great deal!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Picnics are a hit with our neighborhood squirrels
customer_reviews.text: We have a ton of squirrels at the bird feeder so gave them another option to save the deed for the birds. We love watching out the window and so do our cats
customer_reviews.author: Justin Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Cute but not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thinking easy to install which it is. However the craftsmanship is worthless. I hammered all the parts together to make sure it’s sturdy. One screw wasn’t even in the wood
customer_reviews.author: CE367

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!!! Our squirrels wrestle for a spot at the table
customer_reviews.text: we have 6 that routinely visit at the same time & several different feeders. The picnic table is a spot they vie for and one that makes us smile every time we see them 'sitting down' for their meal. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squirrel distractor
customer_reviews.text: This works great. Keeps the squirrels distracted from the bird feed, mostly. So funny to see them sitting at the picnic table having a snack.
customer_reviews.author: Philter

customer_reviews.title: Cool Product!
customer_reviews.text: Squirrels & birds love it. I bought to keep squirrels away from bird feeders, but it seems to attract more birds than anything. I put cobs of corns each day and they are always missing all the kernels when I arrive home from work, so whoever is using, they enjoy it and it’s a nice talking piece on the fence.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: My squirrel kept sitting on the middle piece...which I found out is help up by a tiny screw..which broke...so disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Gessica Absi

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken so I had to spend some time fixing it. Now that it is put back together it is great. My squirrels love it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Raygo

customer_reviews.title: Squirrels will love it!
customer_reviews.text: So cute! Sturdy craftsmanship and just as pictured. Pre-drilled installation holes which is always helpful - nails included. Can’t wait to put it up!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki80

customer_reviews.title: A picnic for the squirrels 🐿
customer_reviews.text: Very well made! The squirrels love it! Solid wood. Seems like it will hold up through the elements.
customer_reviews.author: andrea

customer_reviews.title: Nice squirrel feeder
customer_reviews.text: Very cute but after a week we still are not attracting squirrels. Even put pecans out but squirrels seem scarce this winter.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. The squirrels don’t like it at all, the struggle to get to the corn. Not recommended
customer_reviews.author: Wianca

customer_reviews.title: Adorable squirrel feeder
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. Helps keep the squirrels away from my bird feeder
customer_reviews.author: Elijahmom

customer_reviews.title: Very small
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed because the picture showed it to be a weathered wood look and it is not. Also it is very small!
customer_reviews.author: Maryanne N.

customer_reviews.title: he loves watching the squirrels and seems to really like this, I would definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my dad, he loves watching the squirrels and seems to really like this, I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Venomous

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The table portion is glued. Corn cobbs need to be pushed on table. Mine broke after 2nd use. 😒
customer_reviews.author: PJ Couch

customer_reviews.title: Good quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Good quality construction. My backyard squirrels love it! Although I enjoy hunting squirrels in the wild, I enjoy my backyard squirrels and their company. I believe the feeder has even helped to keep them out of my vegetable garden. I may buy another, and then another as a gift for a family member.
customer_reviews.author: Barry B.

customer_reviews.title: It has a small screw that holds  the corn.
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I wish the screw was fatter but I have to say it is fun watching them run away with the whole ear of corn.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Zachmeyer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for squirrel lovers
customer_reviews.text: Not something you usually buy for yourself, but it made an excellent gift and was much appreciated
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Squirrels in my yard don't sit down on either side, but they do look funny eating off the cob.
customer_reviews.author: JORGE CERVANTES

customer_reviews.title: Squirrel Approved!
customer_reviews.text: I put an apple a day on it and my little squirrel family loves it! It's a little small for them, they are FAT! The smaller one can sit on it. I painted and decorated it!
customer_reviews.author: CV

customer_reviews.title: Fun for squirrel watching
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun product. The squirrels in our yard love it. Strong, sturdy construction. We later bought two different feeders that were inferior. The glue holding them together distigrated in the rain. They highlighted the superior construction of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lkema

customer_reviews.title: Nice craftsmanship!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful craftsmanship! The squirrels love to sit on the bench! I tied mine on with wire through the holes in the picnic bench and wrapped around the tree. I ordered several more to give away to friends, they all loved them. Enjoy watching the squirrels eat the corn!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Very cute addition to the backyard
customer_reviews.text: We love this product and now have a “herd”’of squirrels in our backyard. While it doesn’t stop them from still trying the bird feeder, it allows them to share a bit. 😉
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Adorable
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my dad, as he loves to watch the squirrels. They run up and down the tree getting the peanuts. He is close to 90 so he doesn't move like he used to. He loves sitting by the window and watching. Best gift I could have given him. We did paint it because the wood comes natural. I can take it down and wash it when it gets dirty.
customer_reviews.author: Beach girl

customer_reviews.title: Great Idea and fun to watch!
customer_reviews.text: Nice design, this is the second table i have bought. The second table had a small crack in the upright portion of the table. When screwed into a tree to setup and feed the squirrels the small crack became a big one. I would love a swap out instead of a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Jon Reece

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Simple design, but turns our neighborhood squirrels into little bistro patrons
customer_reviews.author: Cheri L. Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Squirrels picnic table
customer_reviews.text: We love this it took squirrels a couple of weeks to get used to it, now they fight to see who goes first.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Squirrel feeder- small size
customer_reviews.text: I bought this squirrel feeder as a joke for my dad's birthday, but we've been entertained! It took several weeks for the squirrels to even interact with it, but they've finally figured it out. The size is quite small (this is a small squirrel in the pics) so they can't really sit on it. Still entertaining though!
customer_reviews.author: Bailey M.

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!!!  A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love this. The squirrels sit right on it and eat. Its sooooo cute
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda L. Cobian

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I can’t wait to give my dad this for Christmas! So funny.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Miller

customer_reviews.title: Original!
customer_reviews.text: Really cute, appears well made. ( we’ll see after a few days of Wyoming wind). I may be ordering a few more.
customer_reviews.author: Reze

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: The table is attached with one small screw and small staple-like pins. It fell apart after one day of use. Did not support enough weight to feed squirrels without breaking . Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Freeman

customer_reviews.text: Works perfect! Squirrels and chipmunks really sit on the little benches and use it all the time with apples and dried corn
customer_reviews.author: Abi Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Feeder for squirrels
customer_reviews.text: I just love wat CV hing the squirrels eating corn on this little picnic table.
customer_reviews.author: Blodwynn

customer_reviews.title: Awesome an sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and an awesome addition to the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Boombatz

customer_reviews.title: Fun addition to the backyard
customer_reviews.text: Mine came with the table split, but we glued it together and stuck it up anyway. As you can see, the squirrels love it and I enjoy seeing them “picnicking” at their table. I have rather large red squirrels here in Ohio, so I wish the seats were bigger for them!
customer_reviews.author: Heather K

customer_reviews.title: Easy To Hang and Use
customer_reviews.text: I just loved the look of this squirrel feeder. It's adorable. It easily hangs onto the fence with the two included screws.
customer_reviews.author: Bengalkat

customer_reviews.title: Great little table!
customer_reviews.text: Me and the squirrels love it. Super cute and easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: abigail

customer_reviews.title: Makes squirrels even more fun to watch
customer_reviews.text: We put in a 3X3 post and attached it to that. The squirrels love it too
customer_reviews.author: Eileen Findlay

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I love to watch the squirrels picnic on this bench.
customer_reviews.author: D. Anglim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Just waiting on my Squirrel Merle to find it. This is a must buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Bird bench
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for squirrels but the birds have made it their "quad" lunch table. Extremely cute to watch them eat the corn.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Elaine Ahumada

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and FUN
customer_reviews.text: This has brought so much joy to my mother. The squirrels love it and are so cute. It is very well made, the corn is easy to put on and take off. This is a great gift!! My mom has gotten so much enjoyment from it and her grandkids love to come over and watch the squirrels come up to it to eat.
customer_reviews.author: Janet C

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it so much! Goes up very easy and the corn goes on with ease..
customer_reviews.author: Gesila Hargrove

customer_reviews.title: It hurts the animals.
customer_reviews.text: Good design idea, poor execution. The screw that holds the food is very sharp, and it can hurt the animals. That’s exactly what happened, I noticed drops of blood on it.
customer_reviews.author: Yev

customer_reviews.title: Fun picnics for the squirrels!
customer_reviews.text: We buy these about 3 years. The squirrels are so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Molli Hoover

customer_reviews.title: As Described
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little picnic table. My squirrels love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Too small for squirrels
customer_reviews.text: I haven't seen a squirrel yet that could fit on the bench. Each time I put a corn cob on, the squirrels have to eat it by climbing down the tree toward the top of the cob that is mounted on the feeder. Eventually, they just pull the cob off and haul it away. Cute idea, but not proportionate for squirrels.
customer_reviews.author: Cari Wagner

product_meta.title: Picnic Table Squirrel Feeder
product_meta.description:
Size:Pack of 1This beautiful picnic table squirrel feeder is PERFECT for your backyard. Easily place an ear of dried corn on the top of the picnic table using the two inch screw as a holder. Enjoy watching the squirrels as they scamper onto the feeder and have a seat at the table! 

Use this along with a squirrel proof bird feeder to keep the squirrels where you want them. 

This feeder is solidly built from naturally decay resistant cedar. The feeder easily attaches to wooden surfaces with two screws.
feature_bullets: Start Your Day With a Smile by Watching the Squirrels Play on This Cute Picnic Table Feeder. Proudly made in the USA!
A Wonderful Gift For Nature Lovers and Backyard Enthusiasts. You Will Love This Feeder From the Moment You Open it Up and Smell the Freshly Cut Cedar.
Great For Deterring Squirrels From Bird Feeders! (Corn is NOT Included). Nice Additional Product to Go Along with Your Squirrel Proof Bird Feeder.
Feeding Squirrels is a Great Way to Have More Fun With the Wildlife in Your Yard. Watch the Squirrels Chase Each Other in Circles While They Take Turns Sitting on the Benches.

Our Feeders Are Made by Hand in Our Small Shop in Baton Rouge, Louisiana. We Are Certain That You Will Love This Feeder and Offer an Unconditional Money Back Guarantee. The Feeders are Made From Naturally Decay Resistant Cedar and Will Age Beautifully in Your Yard.
